title: Review Submittal Returned 'As Noted'
description: An engineer reviews shop drawings and returns them with the status 'Approved as Noted'. The PM must review the notes and distribute them.

tasks.description: Retrieve the reviewed submittal package for the 'Steel Shop Drawings'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The package with the engineer's markups and 'Approved as Noted' status is retrieved.

tasks.description: Extract the engineer's notes and required changes from the document.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of required modifications is extracted.

tasks.description: Forward the reviewed drawings and the extracted notes to the steel fabricator for incorporation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fabricator receives the required changes to proceed with their work.
